name.str: pair of fire chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of fire chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned exoskeletons of fire ants. Fire-resistant and very durable.

name: fire chitin armor
description: Leg and body armor crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned exoskeletons of fire ants. Fire-resistant and very durable.
Gauntlets crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned exoskeletons of fire ants. Fire-resistant and very durable.

name: fire chitin helmet
description: A helmet crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned exoskeletons of fire ants.  Covers the entire head; fire-resistant and very durable.
Boots crafted from carefully cleaned and pruned exoskeletons of fire ants. Fire-resistant and very durable.
Red stinger taken from an fire ant. Left over venom residue might have some effect if a vital is hit. Useful weapon in a pinch, but handling by itself is difficult
Red stinger taken from an fire ant thats been reinforced with fire chintin into a knife. Left over venom residue might have some effect if a vital is hit.
Red stinger taken from an fire ant thats been strapped to a stick giving increased reach at cost of durability. Left over venom residue might have some effect if a vital is hit.

name: inactive exterminator bot
description: This is an inactive exterminator robot. It resembles a security bot only armed with a flamethrower. Using this item involves placing it on the ground and turning it on.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the robot will race towards enemies and torch them alive.

use_action.friendly_msg: The exterminator bot shudders briefly and rolls away.
use_action.hostile_msg: The exterminator detects gross pests in the area, and shines a multitude of colored lights in your face!
use_action.//: Not as lethal as a secubot but far more fiddly and complex with its implied assembly and sub-deployment systems

name: inactive exterminator tank
description: This is an inactive exterminator tank. It resembles a large tank only armed with a flamethrower & napalm bomb launchers. Using this item involves placing it on the ground and turning it on.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the tank will race towards enemies and torch them alive.

use_action.friendly_msg: The exterminator tank shudders briefly and rolls away.
use_action.hostile_msg: The exterminator tank detects gross pests in the area, and shines a multitude of colored lights in your face!
use_action.//: Not as lethal as a secubot but far more fiddly and complex with its implied assembly and sub-deployment systems

name: inactive explosive skitterbot
description: This is an inactive explosive skitterbot. It resembles a dog size insect packed with explosives. Using this item involves placing it on the ground and turning it on.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the robot will race towards enemies and explode.

use_action.friendly_msg: The explosive skitterbot shudders briefly and rolls away.
use_action.hostile_msg: The explosive skitterbot gives off a loud sharp beep, and shines a multitude of colored lights in your face!
use_action.//: Not as lethal as a secubot but far more fiddly and complex with its implied assembly and sub-deployment systems

name: inactive incendiary skitterbot
description: This is an inactive incendiary skitterbot. It resembles a dog size insect packed with incendiary explosives. Using this item involves placing it on the ground and turning it on.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the robot will race towards enemies and explode.

use_action.friendly_msg: The incendiary skitterbot shudders briefly and rolls away.
use_action.hostile_msg: The incendiary skitterbot gives off a loud sharp beep, and shines a multitude of colored lights in your face!
use_action.//: Not as lethal as a secubot but far more fiddly and complex with its implied assembly and sub-deployment systems
